content:
As of the morning of March 16, there is no Russian ship in the Black and Azov Seas.

About thisinformThe Navy of the Armed Forces, reports the Armyinform.

As it is noted, on the combat duty in the Mediterranean two enemy ships, including one carrier carriage missile "Caliber", a total volley of up to four rockets.

During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, the passage of the Kerch Strait was made:

  • 18 ships to the Azov Sea, eight of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;
  • To the Black Sea - 21 ships, five of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus.

The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (Solas), switching off automatic identification systems (AIS).

Earlier the Armyinformreportedthat Ukrainian cyberfhachivs blocked the supply of components for thousands of Shahaneda and winged missiles.
title: There are no Russian warships in the Black and Azov Seas
description: The Naval Forces of the Armed Forces reports about it, reports the Armyinform. As noted, on ...
author: Army Inform
